text: wa-idha kunta fihim fa-aqamta lahumu l-salata faltaqum taifatun min'hum maʿaka walyakhudhu aslihatahum fa-idha sajadu falyakunu min waraikum waltati taifatun ukh'ra lam yusallu falyusallu maʿaka walyakhudhu hidh'rahum wa-aslihatahum wadda alladhina kafaru law taghfuluna ʿan aslihatikum wa-amtiʿatikum fayamiluna ʿalaykum maylatan wahidatan wala junaha ʿalaykum in kana bikum adhan min matarin aw kuntum marda an tadaʿu aslihatakum wakhudhu hidh'rakum inna l-laha aʿadda lil'kafirina ʿadhaban muhinan
